original_title: ボクの童貞ち○ぽを弄んだ痴女先生の事が忘れられなくて…
overview: Takashi got his first sexual experience with teacher Minami Aizawa. This did set the bar too high for him, and afterwards, he could not get used to other girls. And for good reasons, as teacher Minami is seriously epic and pretty.  Some years later, they casually bump with each other, and they retake their sado teacher and maso student relationship.
title: My Slut Teacher Messed With My Cherry Boy Cock, And I Could Never Ever Forget The Experience… Minami Aizawa
